styles.body: font-sans text-base leading-relaxed bg-[#0F172A] text-[#E5E7EB] antialiased
styles.header-inner: container mx-auto px-4 py-6 flex items-center justify-between gap-4
styles.brand-logo: h-10 w-10 rounded-md bg-gradient-to-br from-[#0EA5E9] to-[#22D3EE] flex items-center justify-center text-white font-bold
styles.nav-link: text-sm text-[#CBD5E1] hover:text-[#F8FAFC] px-3 py-2 rounded-md transition
styles.nav-cta: ml-4 inline-flex items-center gap-2 px-4 py-2 bg-[#0EA5E9] text-white rounded-lg hover:bg-[#38BDF8] transition shadow-sm
styles.mobile-toggle: md:hidden inline-flex items-center justify-center p-2 rounded-md text-[#CBD5E1] hover:bg-[#0F172A] focus:outline-none
styles.mobile-menu: md:hidden mt-2 space-y-2 bg-[#020617] border-t border-[#1E293B] p-4 rounded-b-lg
styles.h1: text-5xl font-extrabold text-[#F8FAFC] mb-8 tracking-tight leading-tight
styles.h6: text-lg font-medium text-[#64748B] mb-2 uppercase tracking-wider
styles.button: inline-flex items-center gap-2 px-6 py-3 bg-[#0EA5E9] text-white rounded-lg hover:bg-[#38BDF8] transition shadow-md
styles.btn-secondary: inline-flex items-center gap-2 px-4 py-2 bg-transparent border border-[#334155] text-[#CBD5E1] rounded-md hover:bg-[#021025] transition
styles.input: w-full px-4 py-2 border border-[#334155] rounded-lg bg-[#020617] text-[#F8FAFC] focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#22D3EE] focus:border-[#22D3EE]
styles.textarea: w-full px-4 py-2 border border-[#334155] rounded-lg bg-[#020617] text-[#F8FAFC] focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#22D3EE] focus:border-[#22D3EE]
styles.select: w-full px-4 py-2 border border-[#334155] rounded-lg bg-[#020617] text-[#F8FAFC] focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#22D3EE] focus:border-[#22D3EE]
styles.label: text-sm font-medium mb-1 block text-[#CBD5E1]
styles.th: px-4 py-3 border border-[#1E293B] bg-[#0EA5E9] text-white text-left font-medium
styles.td: px-4 py-3 border border-[#1E293B] text-[#CBD5E1] align-top
